channel.title: CVE Feed for MyThemeShop -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MyThemeShop -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36844|2024-08-04T01:01:59.831Z -- mythemeshop -- wp%20subscribe%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in MyThemeShop WP Subscribe plugin <= 1.2.12 on WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2021-36829|2024-08-04T01:01:59.780Z -- mythemeshop -- launcher%3A%20coming%20soon%20%26%20maintenance%20mode%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Authenticated (admin+) Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in MyThemeShop Launcher: Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode plugin <= 1.0.11 at WordPress.

item.title: CVE-2024-37938|2024-08-02T04:04:24.188Z -- mythemeshop -- sociallyviral
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in MyThemeShop SociallyViral.This issue affects SociallyViral: from n/a through 1.0.10.
